resources.string: Space Trooper is a small 2D game engine, developed by Jasper Bloom, an undergraduate student at the University of Washington. Right now it is only available in 3 levels but if you feel satisfied with this old school styled of game, shoot an email at jbloom1704@gmail.com and I will add more levels and features. Thank you for playing Space Trooper. Your feed back is important.
Defeat the bos to get to next level
